meanings.definition: Make or cause to make a sharp, hard, metallic sound.
meanings.sent1: The pots and pans were clanking loudly in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: I heard the clanking of metal tools in the garage.
meanings.sent3: The clanking of the spoons sounded like a musical performance.
meanings.sent4: The clanking of the chains echoed through the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The clanking noise was so loud, it could be heard from far away.

meanings.sent1: The clanking of the hammer against the metal was deafening.
meanings.sent2: The old machinery made a constant clanking noise.
meanings.sent3: The clanking of the coins in the piggy bank made me smile.
meanings.sent4: The clanking of the train wheels against the tracks was rhythmic.
meanings.sent5: The sudden clanking startled the birds in the trees.
